body_html: For anybody else finding this issue, since tensorboard was split out from tensorflow the command to run is just tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR instead of python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR as it was previously.
body_text: For anybody else finding this issue, since tensorboard was split out from tensorflow the command to run is just tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR instead of python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR as it was previously.
body: For anybody else finding this issue, since tensorboard was split out from tensorflow the command to run is just `tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR` instead of `python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR` as it was previously.
